connect_msg: Connect your wallet to add a bag (0.1 TON fee)
bag_not_found: Bag not found in TON Storage
invalid_bagid: Invalid Bag ID (must be 64 hex characters)
faq_a1: A decentralized file indexer built on TON Storage. We don't host any files â€” we only index Bag IDs shared by the community.
faq_a2: A unique 64-character hexadecimal identifier that points to a collection of files stored on the TON Storage network.
faq_a3: Copy the Bag ID and open it with a TON Storage client like
faq_q4: How do I add a bag?
faq_a4: Click "+ Add Bag", connect your TON wallet, enter the Bag ID, name, category, and pay 0.1 TON to submit.
faq_a5: A small fee to prevent spam and cover network costs. Your wallet address is saved as the uploader.
faq_q6: How to access via TON network?
faq_a6: Use a TON-compatible browser or proxy to access piracy.ton directly on the TON network.
